rules.name: If_All_Checkboxes_Are_True
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11 AND 12 AND 13 AND 14 AND 15 AND 16 AND 17 AND 18 AND 19 AND 20 AND 21 AND 22 AND 23 AND 24 AND 25 AND 26
rules.label: If All Checkboxes Are True

rules.name: If_All_Critical_Checkboxes_Are_True_And_Any_Non_Critical_False
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND (8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18 OR 19 OR 20 OR 21 OR 22 OR 23 OR 24 OR 25 OR 26)
rules.label: If All Critical Checkboxes Are True And Any Non Critical False

decisions.name: If_Payment_is_Not_Null
decisions.label: If Payment Plan is Not Null
